original_text: So Saul died for his breach of faith. He broke faith with the Lord in that he did not keep the command of the Lord, and also consulted a medium, seeking guidance.
korean_text: 사울이 죽은 것은 여호와께 범죄하였기 때문이라 그가 여호와의 말씀을 지키지 아니하고 또 신접한 자에게 가르치기를 청하고

sentences.original_text: So Saul died for his breach of faith.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사울은 그의 불신앙 때문에 죽었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He broke faith with the Lord
in that he did not keep the command of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주님의 명령을 지키지 않았기 때문입니다.
